title: Refrain Blue
synopsis: A trip to the beach turns out to be more than expected for two people who are mourning the losses of their beloved. Perhaps a mysterious girl known as the "Umi Warabe" can help them to heal their wounds and move on with their lives.
staff: [['Oomiya, Saburou', ['Producer']], ['Yoshioka, Takao', ['Screenplay']], ['ELF Corporation', ['Original Creator']], ['Hashimoto, Hideki', ['Animation Director']]]
